segments.text: Alright , we need to have a plan here . First of all , which bed do you want ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , everybody wants the bottom bunk . Why don't we flip a coin for it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . Do you have a coin ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Here's a quarter . I flip it , you call it in the air .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Heads .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , it's tails . You lose .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , well . So you get the bottom bunk . What about our stereos ? It looks like we both brought our stereos . Probably we only have room for one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your stereo is better than mine . Do you mind if we use yours ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don't mind . I just don't know where we can put the speakers in this tiny room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Probably we can put one on that counter . And we can put one on the floor by the bed . Over there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . That's a good plan . What about the desks ? We have two desks , one by the window and one by the door ? Which one do you want ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the desk by the window is nicer , of course . Don't you think ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I agree .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So since I got the bottom bunk , why don't you get the desk by the window ? That would be more fair .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I mean , we could flip a coin for it , but I would probably win again . I'm incredibly lucky you know . Especially with girls .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that's right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I hope you let me hang out with you then . Maybe I can learn from you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , certainly . Certainly . I'm always willing to help beginners.Just call me Big Brother Dave .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are all lucky people so stuck up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: C'mon , don't take it seriously ! I'm just kidding .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Anyway , I get the desk by the window , you get the bottom bunk . That's it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't we start unpacking these boxes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will go get something to eat . You unpack first.Then , when I come back , I'll unpack .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright . See you later .
segments.speaker: S2
